name: Mr. Key
description:
Watch out, lava is rising! Your only way out is getting to the top of the tower and finishing the level!

To make the game run smoothly: Turn on "Hardware Acceleration"  in your browser! In Chrome it is Settings -> Search "Hardware Acceleration", than eneble it and it will run smooth!

W-A-S-D to move
 SPACE to jump
 MOUSE POINTER is crossair
 LEFT MOUSE BUTTON is shoot
You have 4 PowerUps: Good ones
Good onesBad onesBad onesPowerUp  The one with a strong arm and blue background:The one with a bullet and blue background:The one with a not so strong arm and red background
The one with a skull and red backgroundWhat he does:You can 2 shot enemy's!It will give you 5 more bullets!You 5 shot enemy's
It makes you instant dead

This game was made by MatthyDev and created for Dani's basement game jam.
